org.exist.xqj
Class Marshaller

java.lang.Object
  org.exist.xqj.Marshaller

public class Marshaller
extends Object

A utility class that provides marshalling services for external variables and methods to create DOM Nodes from streamed representation.

Author:
Wolfgang Meier
